title: 125. New Generation of Meat Alternatives | SavorEat
description: In this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron sits down with Racheli Vizman, the co-founder and chief executive officer of 3D food printing outlet SavorEat. Barron and Vizman explore menu innovation via alternative proteins.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
